data.title: Porter-Billups Leadership Academy Announces Chauncey Billups as Annual Gala Keynote Speaker
data.meta_description: The Porter-Billups Leadership Academy (PBLA) is pleased to announce Portland Trail Blazers coach, former NBA player and co-executive director of PBLA, Chaunc...
data.text:
The July 27 event will be held at the Gaylord Rockies Resort & Convention Center

The Porter-Billups Leadership Academy (PBLA) is pleased to announce Portland Trail Blazers coach, former NBA player and co-executive director of PBLA, Chauncey Billups as the 2024 keynote speaker for its annual gala and fundraising auction. The gala will also feature national recording artist and grammy nominated R&B singer, Kenny Lattimore who will provide live entertainment for the evening.

The gala will take place Saturday, July 27 at 5:30 p.m. at the Gaylord Rockies Resort & Convention Center. The event includes a cocktail hour, live and silent auctions, dinner, and a conversation with Billups and sports commentator and former Denver Nuggets player, Scott Hastings. The evening will also celebrate Coach Lonnie Porter's transition to Founder Emeritus.

The Porter-Billups Leadership Academy was established in 1996 by Regis University Menâ€™s Basketball Head Coach Lonnie Porter and his daughter, Staci Porter-Bentley. The Porter-Billups Leadership Academy at Regis University provides a summer academy for 3rd through 12th graders that cultivates character development through an extensive academic curriculum and provides exposure to career opportunities for young leaders in their pursuit of individual success.

The organization gained the support of Billups in 2006 to act as a positive role model and promote individual values, academic excellence, and leadership skills.

Proceeds from the gala and fundraiser will benefit the Porter-Billups Leadership Academy programs held each summer on the Regis University campus. Registration is now open at porterbillups-denver.org/gala
